root.name: Tidalis
root.description: GameplayTidalis' basic gameplay involves orienting directional arrows on like-colored blocks, then eliminating those blocks by triggering a chain of pulses between them. Variants on the basic mechanics include levels where gravity affects the trajectory of the pulses, as well as blocks that can only be removed in non-traditional fashion, such as dropping them out of the bottom of the grid or eliminating a certain-colored block next to them.System RequirementsPC System RequirementsMac System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000 or later, 32 or 64 bitProcessor: 1.4Ghz CPU minimum, 1.8 Ghz recommended for background animation or multiplayerMemory: 512 MB RAM (1 GB recommended)Graphics: : 800x600 or greater screen resolution (32 bit color, 1280x720 recommended)DirectX®: N/AHard Drive: 600MBSound: No special requirementsOther Requirements: Internet Connection or LAN required for networked multiplayer.
